alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hey everyone around the seven realms!

We can now confirm that droprates of recipes and parts follow the same pattern; recipe at night only=> parts at night only. The following list of drops is now confirmed. Thanks to all people that gave feedback!

Legend:
🌄Morning
🌇Day
🏙Evening
🌌Night

Weapons
Champion Sword: 🌄🌇🏙
Hunter Dagger: 🌄🌇🏙
War Hammer: 🌄🌇🏙
Trident: 🌌
Order Shield:🌌
Hunter Bow: 🌌

Order Armor Set
(Helmet) Order Helmet:🌌
(Armor) Order Armor:🌌
(Gloves) Order Gauntlets:🌄🌇🏙
(Boots) Order Boots:🌄🌇🏙

Clarity Armor Set
(Helmet) Clarity Circlet:🌌
(Armor) Clarity Robe:🌌
(Gloves) Clarity Bracers:🌄🌇🏙
(Boots) Clarity Shoes:🌄🌇🏙

Hunter Armor Set
(Helmet) Hunter Helmet:🌄🌇🏙
(Armor) Hunter Armor:🌄🌇🏙
(Gloves) Hunter Gloves:🌌
(Boots) Hunter Boots:🌌
alfredsnippet.name: Swamp/Valley Drops
